description: This file contains unit tests for the TriState class in the WPEFramework project, specifically testing its initialization, setting, and getting of states using Google Test framework.

classes.name: TriState
classes.description: A class representing a tri-state logic (True, False, Unknown) with methods for setting and getting its state.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Returns the current state of the TriState object.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets the state of the TriState object. Can accept a boolean or an EnumState value.
